issues.title: Create responsive navigation with flexbox and hover effects
issues.description:
Build horizontal navigation bar using flexbox.

**Requirements:**
- Nav links: Home; Avengers Roster; Missions Archive; Intel Database; Training; Threat Assessment
- display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center
- Hover effects: transform: translateY(-2px); color transition to arc-reactor cyan; text-shadow
- Active link indicator with border-bottom
- Mobile hamburger menu structure (hidden for now; functionality added later)

**Depends on:** #2 (HTML nav)

issues.title: Implement sticky header with glassmorphism effect
issues.description:
Make header sticky with modern glassmorphism.

**Requirements:**
- position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 1000
- backdrop-filter: blur(10px) saturate(180%)
- Semi-transparent background: rgba(26; 26; 26; 0.8)
- Add class .scrolled via CSS (JS will toggle later) for box-shadow when scrolled
- Smooth transition: all 0.3s ease

**Depends on:** #6 (navigation structure)

issues.title: Design Avengers roster grid with modern CSS Grid
issues.description:
Create 'Meet the Team' section using CSS Grid.

**Requirements:**
- Grid: repeat(auto-fit; minmax(300px; 1fr)); gap: 2rem
- Each card: aspect-ratio: 1/1; gradient background; border-radius: 16px; overflow: hidden
- Card structure: image area; name overlay; codename badge
- Hover effect: transform: scale(1.05) rotateZ(2deg); box-shadow increases; filter: brightness(1.1)
- transition: all 0.4s cubic-bezier(0.175; 0.885; 0.32; 1.275)

**Depends on:** #3 (CSS variables)

issues.title: Add custom fonts with @font-face and font-display
issues.description:
Add superhero-themed fonts for dramatic typography.

**Requirements:**
- Download 'Bebas Neue' (headings) and 'Rajdhani' (body) to /fonts folder
- Use @font-face with font-display: swap for performance
- Define in CSS variables: --font-heading: 'Bebas Neue'; --font-body: 'Rajdhani'
- Add fallbacks to sans-serif system fonts
- Apply throughout site

**Depends on:** #1 (fonts folder)

issues.title: Create animated statistics counter section with large numbers
issues.description:
Design eye-catching stats section.

**Requirements:**
- Display: 'Missions Completed: 1;247' 'Threats Neutralized: 892' 'Civilians Saved: 2.4M' 'Team Members: 12'
- Layout: flexbox row; wrapped on mobile
- Large bold numbers (font-size: 4rem; font-weight: 900)
- Icons using Unicode symbols (⚡ 🛡️ 👥 🎯)
- Subtle background pattern using repeating-linear-gradient
- Numbers will animate later with JS

**Depends on:** #8 (roster section for context)
